cleaned_text: spirituality [r/spirituality](/r/spirituality/) Here, we discuss such things as personal transformation, the meaning of life, death, and moments of clarity. There is no single, widely-agreed definition of spirituality. Many people gravitate toward spirituality to seek religious-like understandings without the ideological constraints of institutional religion. This community, however, is open to everyone, religious and non-religious alike. Join us in finding our place in the universe. My 24 years old brother were diagnosed with an inoperable brain tumour... I'm begging to the universe to cure him! Please, if you're a spiritual healer, help me...if you're not, please pray for him! He's the best person I know, I'm absolutely sure he would make the world a better place if he survives.
